content:
Good catch! Might be worth discussing what we want to know from our users. On my side, I'd like to ask them a few things:

  • Do they have issues using rustdoc, and if yes which ones?
  • Are there missing features they'd want?

I also have other things in mind but they're too "open" (the one I asked are already super open...), like "how would improve the UX/UI?".
I would ask if users feel things are missing/not enough in doctests, how often they use local/distant documentation
Please post in that channel so it's seen :)
